#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
       string a;
       char b;
       int count=0,c;
       
       getline(cin,a);
       cin >> b;
       
       c = a.length();
       
       for(int i=0;i<c;i++)
         if(a[i] == b)
          count++;
          
       cout << count << endl;
       
       return 0;
       }
